original_title: Sri Lanka and Ireland Face Off in 1st Test Match at Galle International Cricket Stadium
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – This morning at 10 am, Sri Lanka will take on Ireland in the 1st Test Match at the Galle International Cricket Stadium. While Ireland has only played three Test matches in the past, all between 2018 and 2019, they are set to double that tally in just one month in 2023.

For those who cannot make it to the stadium, the match will be broadcast live on TV1, with MTV MBC Channels Pvt. Ltd. "The Champion Network" serving as the official match telecaster of the series. Don't miss a moment of the excitement as these two teams face off in what promises to be a thrilling match.
